tool_description:
Welcome to VizorAds. Utilize QR codes via blockchain to authenticate your AI products and services. 
Protect your products from AI duplication and manipulation. Images or Content related.  Use VizorAds to inject content into NFTs. Or simply use the QR code to transfrom a document or product to a blockchain registered offering.
name: Vizor Ads
title: Vizor Ads

api_list.name: Show
api_list.description: Get details of your existing embed records using it's unique slug
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vizor-ads.p.rapidapi.com/embeds/show/7dW8zGbP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vizor-ads.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vizor-ads.p.rapidapi.com/embeds/show/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vizor-ads.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
